skins.selfIntroduction: I saw many things during the war, though my construction never finished. But now I get to lead a new life as a part of this fleet... This is a gift from the magic realm... or rather, a gift from destiny.
skins.acquisition: I'm the destroyer L'Opini?tre, a so-called "magician" from Iris Libre. It's a pleasure meeting you. Umm, actually, please forget the "magician" part.
skins.login: I knew you'd be back right about now, Commander. Hm? Oh, well... I made that prediction based on your day-to-day activity.
skins.details: This book lists hundreds upon hundreds of powerful spells... In my imagination, that is. It's just a regular old book of fairy-tales. No, really, that's all.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Let me tell you... Miss Dunkerque's sweets are truly magical.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Poke. Hm? Oh, don't mind me. I just got a sudden urge to poke you with my wand. Pokey-poke.
skins.secretaryIdle3: If someone told you they'd grant you one wish, what would you ask for, Commander?
skins.secretaryTouch: Feeling tired, Commander? Then would you like me to cast an awakening "spell" over your head with my wand?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Please stay where you are. I must go look for a spell that'll turn you into a rabbit.

skins.shipDescription: It is said that the summertime sea holds an extraordinary enchantment over people... but the only supernatural thing I'm feeling is this accursed heat... Am I missing something?
skins.acquisition: It is said that the summertime sea holds an extraordinary enchantment over people... but the only supernatural thing I'm feeling is this accursed heat... Am I missing something?
skins.login: Jeez, how'd my glasses end up in the sand... Um, where's my handkerchief... ah, there it is! Oh, Commander, when did you get here?
skins.details: It is undignified to stare so much at a maiden's swimsuit. B-besides, it's really embarrassing...
skins.secretaryIdle1: If only there was a spell to make it cool down... maybe something to blot out the sun? Hehe, just kidding. A cold drink will suffice. Commander, what would you like?
skins.secretaryIdle2: The sheer number of people gathered here... is this the mystical allure of the summertime beach?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, have you seen Temeraire? ...She's playing beach volleyball with the others? Hehe, I see she's as full of energy as ever.
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander... you didn't get heatstroke, did you?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Do you want to be turned into a starfish?
